```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
```


```{r}
fa <- function(t, w = pi*5) sin(w*t)
fb <- function(t) as.numeric(abs(t) < 1)
fc <- function(t, a = 1, b = 1) (abs(t) < a/2) * ifelse(t < 0, b + t * (2*b/a), b + t * (-2*b/a))
fd <- function(t, a = 1, b = 1) (t < 0) * (t > -a/2) * (-2*b/a) * t

t <- seq(-pi/2, pi/2, length = 100000)

```


```{r, code_folding=TRUE}
fs <- bind_cols(
  t = t,
  fa = fa(t)/2 + 0.5,
  fb = fb(t),
  fc = fc(t, a = 1),
  fd = fd(t, a = 1)
) %>%
  pivot_longer(-t, names_to = "f", values_to = "f_t") %>%
  group_by(f) %>%
  mutate(fft_w = fft(f_t))

fs %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = t, y = f_t, colour = f), show.legend = FALSE, size = 2) +
  theme_void() +
  facet_wrap(~f)
```
